data.text:
@giulio_mattioli Imagine going back to March 2016 and telling them what was going to happen over the next 6 years.
They'd burn you as a witch.
@giulio_mattioli Germany is literaly the only major European country where that holds true. https://t.co/VeV3a7h5GJ
@sidslim Germany had a pretty mild 1st wave.
@giulio_mattioli Is this a measurement thing (as in 1st wave mortality poorly recorded), or did Germany just have very low mortality in the 1st wave?
@giulio_mattioli Imagine if 2 years ago someone said we would have vaccines and 1 out of every 5 Germans would choose not to get one...
